mapper.select: select count(clientCode) as number, sum(totalMoney) as totalAmount, sum(amount) as amount, date_format( from_unixtime(createTime ), '%m-%d' ) as time from f_order where orderStatus != 2 and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{1} DAY) <= from_unixtime( createTime ) group by date_format( from_unixtime( createTime ),'%m-%d' )
